code:
```mermaid
---
config:
  theme: redux-color
  look: neo
---

sequenceDiagram
  actor User as User
  participant WebUI as WebUI
  participant Server as Server
  participant Database as Database

  User ->>+WebUI: Open product cart page
  WebUI ->>+ Server: Request cart items
  Server ->>+ Database: Query cart items
  Database -->>- Server: Return cart items
  Server -->>WebUI: 200 / {meta, list of product}
  User ->>WebUI: Adjust product quantity
  WebUI ->>Server: UPDATE / cart{}
  Server ->>+Database: Save new product quantity
  Database -->>- Server: Return new product quantity
  Server -->> WebUI: 200 / {meta,product quantity}
  User ->>WebUI: Choose product remove
  WebUI ->> Server: DELETE / cart-item{}
  Server -->> +Database : Delete product in cart
  Database -->>- Server: Return updated cart
  Server -->>-WebUI: 200 / {meta, list of product}
  WebUI->>-WebUI: Display updated cart
